divideConquerBrownianBridge

public static java.util.List<SpaceTime> divideConquerBrownianBridge(MultivariateNormalDistribution normal,
                                                                    SpaceTime start,
                                                                    SpaceTime end,
                                                                    int depth,
                                                                    int maxTries,
                                                                    SpaceTimeRejector rejector)
Divide and conquer brownian bridge; NOT THREAD-SAFE!!!!!

Parameters:
normal - multivariate normal distribution characterizing Brownian bridge
start - starting spacetime
end - ending spacetime
depth - depth of divide and conquer recursion resulting in 2^(depth-1) new points
maxTries - maximum number of rejections for each level - MUST BE 1 for correct sampling under absorptive boundaries (says AlexeiMarc)
rejector - invalid space/time rejector
Returns:
list of points, containing 2 + 2^(depth-1) points

                                              int depth,
                                              int maxTries,
                                              SpaceTimeRejector rejector)
